long_description: The DAKINE Targa gloves provide breathable, waterproof warmth, high durability and excellent dexterity. They have a low-profile design and breathe well for days that aren't super frigid. Nylon/polyester shells have GORE-TEX(R) waterproof breathable inserts to keep your hands dry on winter outings; exterior has a Durable Water Repellent treatment. High-loft synthetic insulation keeps your hands toasty; polyester tricot linings add warmth and wick moisture. Durable, perforated fabric on the back of the DAKINE Targa gloves enhances breathability; a great feature when you're active or the weather isn't extremely cold. Leather palms offer good grip and durability; they're treated with a Durable Water Repellent finish to repel wet snow. Zippered cuff closures create a snug seal around your wrists and fit underneath your jacket's sleeves to seal in warmth. Wipe your cold nose with the soft panels on the thumbs.
short_description: The DAKINE Targa gloves provide breathable, waterproof warmth, high durability and excellent dexterity. They have a low-profile design and breathe well for days that aren't super frigid.
